statements: DELETE FROM DemographicData WHERE population < 50000 AND poverty_rate > 10.0;
DELETE FROM DemographicData WHERE median_income >= 75000 OR community_name = 'Oakland';
DELETE FROM poverty_initiatives WHERE funding_amount > 10000 AND community_id = 123
DELETE FROM initiatives WHERE community_id = 3 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM communities WHERE region = 'West' AND state = 'CA';
DELETE FROM target_communities WHERE community_id = 100 AND target_population < 50000;
